item.description:
Meetup at Suso Latino Basket on Wednesday, March 27th at 7:00.  After a long hiatus it's time to start dining out again.  Let's go to a wonderful little place run by owner/chef - Jesus Seoane. The reviews are quite good, and I am a fan of the Pollo al Jerez which is chicken, mushrooms, roasted potatoes in lightly spiced sherry-tomato sauce. Vegetarian dishes upon request, seafood, braised short ribs, etc. all prepared to order (spice it up or make it plain or substitute items if desired.

Website: http://www.susolatinobasket.net/

It will be Tapas night, weekly selection changes and are in addition to the regular menu.  Prices range from $10.00 to $18.00 for dinner entrees, Tapas and desserts are $5.00 so this is a great for your wallet as well as the tummy.

I will collect $1.00 at the event from each participant for "dues".  This is a reservation, so please arrive on time,  and DO NOT change your RSVP less than 48 hours in advance as I will have to confirm the number in our group then. If you must change your RSVP please email me at Meetup.  There is a wait list, and I can increase the # of people if you email me at Meetup.

Hope to see you there for a great meal!

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: SUSO LATINO BASKET 3/27 @ 7:00
